title: Victorious Morgana: Mystery Box?
body:
Can we get this skin via mystery box?
If not, how else?
(I regret not playing ranked last season, as morg is my fav

replies.body:
Achievement skins are not available via Mystery Boxes. It was given out to those who achieved Gold+ during the 2014 seasons, as others in this thread have said. 

Unfortunately, there's no way to get this skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=QoPBqEg1,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-11T23:03:36.405+0000)
>
> Achievement skins are not available via Mystery Boxes. It was given out to those who achieved Gold+ during the 2014 seasons, as others in this thread have said. 
> 
> Unfortunately, there's no way to get this skin.

Just a suggestion, but what if it was permitted for season 5 Gold players to choose their Victorious skin? One (or maybe more!) new one(s), plus the older ones.

I would give both Victorious Morgana and Championship Riven for Victorious Janna. 
 ~Uiru
It's a cool idea, but I don't think it's totally fair for those who earned the older Victorious skins in past seasons.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=QoPBqEg1,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2015-02-12T17:44:44.656+0000)
>
> It's a cool idea, but I don't think it's totally fair for those who earned the older Victorious skins in past seasons.

Well, those people would still have more of them than others. Choosing an older skin means you don't get a newer skin. Someone who has been gold for five seasons would have five, while I would only have two. Janna is just one of a small list that are actually important to me.
 ~Uiru

Everyone talks about 'fair', but then you have people who don't even like to play Ranked or do not play it at all. I've seen so much talk about certain topics not being fair and this really isn't so different tbh.

{{item:3070}} {{champion:25}} {{item:3070}} 

I was so close, and by close I mean Bronze V.
You had to have Gold ranking or higher during the 2014 Season. There is no other way to get it.
No. It's a skin for those who reached Gold or higher in S4.

No, there is no way to obtain it or any previous Victorious skins. They are a sign of achievement in ranked play, and should not be made available any other way. Even though I badly want Victorious Janna  :(
